Welcome to chemRIXSDataAccelerator’s documentation!¶

chemRIXSDataAccelerator is a Python library for users of the chemRIXS instrument at LCLS-II

Note

This project is under active development.

class reduceFuncs_chemRIXS.chemRIXSdat(exp, run, run_dark, acq, exp_c)¶

initialises the chemRIXSdat class

Providing basic information on experiment

Parameters

  • exp (string) – experiment number, e.g. ‘rix100836924’

  • run (int) – run number of run to analyse, e.g. 24

  • run_dark (int) – run number of a run which was recorded without laser and X-ray for background subtraction

  • acq ({‘int’, ‘ss’}) – acquistion type to be analysed - either integrating detectors (‘int’) or single shot (‘ss’)

  • exp_c (int) – count of shots per integrated frame

Returns

self (class) – class containing raw and processed data

__init__(exp, run, run_dark, acq, exp_c)¶
